item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“Acrodox, post:3, topic:405248”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=502241.msg3674392#msg3674392 date=1311150161]
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “945 3095
3108 0 1 1 3 3 Runescape Guide”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499)
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2195)
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:34)
at server.Server.(Server.java:62)
Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

When I run my server this comes up.
All I did was try to add an NPC, and I don’t know what I have done wrong.
My Base is PI btw.
[/quote]

something with he NPChandler.java i assume.[/quote]

Well, i added this:

//Tutorial Island spawn = 945 3095 3108 0 1 1 3 3 Runescape Guide spawn = 943 3104 3095 0 1 1 3 3 Survival Expert spawn = 942 3076 3085 0 1 1 3 3 Master Chef spawn = 949 3086 3122 0 1 1 3 3 Quest Guide spawn = 948 3081 9504 0 1 1 3 3 Mining Instructor spawn = 944 3104 9506 0 1 1 3 3 Combat Instructor spawn = 947 3127 3124 0 1 1 3 3 Financial Advisor spawn = 95 3124 3107 0 1 1 3 3 Brother Brace spawn = 946 3140 3085 0 1 1 3 3 Financial Advisor spawn = 87 3105 9514 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3105 9517 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3106 9514 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3104 9514 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3105 9519 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3109 9516 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3108 9520 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 87 3102 9517 0 1 1 3 3 giant rat spawn = 316 3102 3093 0 0 0 0 0 fishing spot //End of Tutorial Island
